Title: Siam Sunset
Actors: Linus Roache, Danielle Cormack, Ian Bliss, Roy Billing
Plot: A British design executive, who seemingly has everything going for him has his life totally changed when a refrigerator falls from an aircraft and lands on his wife. He decides to getaway from it all by taking a trip to Australia. On his bus, he meets a wild group of eccentrics, including a woman who has stolen cash from her drug-dealing boy friend. As the movie moves along, we learn further that the executive is constantly accident-prone and drawn into unlikely situations. The film's title refers to a new design color that Roache is trying to develop.
Production: Artist Services, Showtime Australia, New South Wales Film & Television Office, Channel Four Films, South Australian Film Corporation
